column6:
The Living Laser is back, and having merged with the aurora borealis, he's laying waste to the Great White North. Iron Man had better call in the cavalry! Wait, no--the Mounties! No, better yet--Canada's greatest super heroes, ALPHA FLIGHT! ,2008,3
32 PGS./All Ages ...$2.99
column8: | colorist:Marte Gracia | penciller (cover):Sean Murphy | artist:Graham Nolan | inker:Victor Olazaba | letterer:Dave Sharpe | writer:Fred Van Lente
